segments.text: Do I have to talk to the interviewer or just leave my application ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You should communicate with the interviewer whose company you are interested in , and make a good impression on him or her . In that case , your chance of success will be greater .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What should I do in the fair ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You should take a look at all the companies , choose your favorite ones , go over to talk with the interviewer and leave your resume in the end .
segments.speaker: S2
